reqs:
Pre-reqs: All of NURS 302, NURS 303, NURS 304, NURS 305, NURS 306, NURS 333, NURS 334, NURS 335, NURS 336, NURS 337, NURS 338, NURS 339, NURS 340, NURS 341, NURS 342, NURS 343.
Co-reqs: NURS 344.
All BSN students are registered in NURS 420. Reassignment to appropriate focus course NURS 420-425 usually occurs in December and is done by the School of Nursing.

description: Credit is given for one of NURS 420, 422, 423, 424, or 425.
